comments.author: John Doe
comments.text: Are we sure about this classification? I can't see any SNIa features in the spectrum.

comments.author: John Doe
comments.text: Definitely a CV, already classified in 2020 by Mike. No need to classify again, it can't be a supernova Ia.

comments.author: Mark
comments.text: I think this is a SNIa, but I'm not sure. Can someone else take a look? Attached is the spectrum. Shows some Silicon absorption lines at 6150A, but there a lot of noise in this spectrum.
